description:
The only course you need to finally understand your employee stock options!

Core Financial Concepts' Employee Stock options for Private Companies course spans 5 sections with a total of 9 lectures. In less than 45 minutes, you will:

  • Learn what employee stock options are and how they work
  • Understand the key dates affecting your options
  • Follow an employee and her options all the way to an IPO
  • Get a primer on income taxes for options
  • See the 3 keys you need to know when thinking about your options

By the end of the course, you'll have a framework to use to think about what to do with YOUR options given YOUR financial situation.

Don't risk making bad decisions. If you work at a private company, and have employee stock options, this is the course you've been waiting for!!!
title: Employee Stock Options
